text: While working on the Trapit's site with their version of Galapagos  I realized there don't seem to be error messages when one can't save a post.
So, for example, if I enter most of the fields but I miss one required field it won't let me save and it won't tell me what's wrong. Obviously it's low pri but I wanted through it out there.
we already have a pretty cool modal for uploading images, maybe we could fire that with different copy? Maybe we can play up orange or white to make it feel different and important.
either that, or you could highlight the empty fields with a different color. like instead of orange they could be red if they are required and empty
Both sound cool. I like the second one since there's no modal to dismiss so it feels quicker but that's just my opinion.

yeah. i wasn't quite sure what you were talking about at first. 
additionally, we use this area for messaging.
